results.headline: Diary of a Country Priest
results.summary_short: Robert Bresson's bleak but richly photographed film is about the suffering and downfall of a young, critically ill priest (Claude Laydu) who struggles in vain to gain some kind, any kind, of ecclesiastical foothold in a rural area bent on circumventing him and the church.

results.headline: Pickwick Papers, The
results.summary_short: Dickens's gentle bumbler and friends. A bit quaint but given the royal British treatment. Good entertainment.

results.headline: Naked Jungle, The
